New_Orleans.Faubourg Marigny:
Faubourg Marigny ( FOH-burg MARR-in-ee; sometimes called The Marigny) is a neighborhood of the city of New Orleans, Louisiana, U.S.A.
Its boundaries as defined by the City Planning Commission are North Rampart Street and St. Claude Avenue to the north, Press Street to the east, the Mississippi River to the south, and Esplanade Avenue to the west.


== Geography ==
Faubourg Marigny is located at 29°57′53″N 90°03′19″W and has an elevation of 1 foot (0.3 m).
